title: Efficiency of eating lower on the food chain

content.question: The land on a 100-acre farm is equally suited for grazing cattle and growing corn. Of the following ways of distributing land use, which would produce the greatest number of calories of human consumption?

choices.label: Acres for Grazing Cattle Acres for Growing Corn 100 0
Acres for Grazing Cattle Acres for Growing Corn 80 20
Acres for Grazing Cattle Acres for Growing Corn 50 50
Acres for Grazing Cattle Acres for Growing Corn 20 80
Acres for Grazing Cattle Acres for Growing Corn 0 100

content.answer: Acres for Grazing Cattle Acres for Growing Corn 0 100

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
